text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.title: Mod Settings
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.enab:
This setting allows you to completely disable Mod.
Checkout controls.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.styl:
Controls how SimpleChestGui will highlight chests.
Boxes only: Chests will be highlighted with a colored box around them.
Lines only: Chests will be highlighted with a line going from your crosshair to the chest.
Lines and boxes: Both of the above.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.ches: Normal chests will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.trap: Trapped chests will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.ende: Ender chests will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.ches: Minecarts with chests will be highlighted in this color.
Boats with chests will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.barr: Barrels will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.shul: Shulker boxes will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.hopp: Hoppers will be highlighted in this color.
Minecarts with hoppers will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.drop: Droppers will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.disp: Dispensers will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.simpchestgui.option.furn: Furnaces, smokers, and blast furnaces will be highlighted in this color.
